Key: Hm? Oh, Kusakabe-san?
Um... Itsuka-kun?
Hello. Are you out shopping?

Ah, dear... You caught me in an embarrassing
moment.

(There was a supermarket bag next to
Kusakabe-san. Inside were cup noodles,
and packaged side dishes peeking out.)
(Hmm. They're all ready-made items.)
These are all terrible for your diet.

My ears hurt... I know that, but I can't
help but depend on these.

If you'd like, maybe I can teach you some easy
recipes?

I'm grateful, but I never know when I'll be
deployed on duty. I can't really spend too
much time cooking.
Oh, I see.
Well, I wish I could, but it's a pain.

(Kusakabe-san smiles brightly, but carrying the
burden of her team must be harder than I can
imagine.)
(Putting that aside...)
Is beer all right?

That goes in a different stomach. It's fuel for
adults.

(I feel like this is a bigger red flag than the
instant food. Should I be worried...?)

Oh, man. I wish I had a wife like you,
Itsuka-kun.
Er, well...
See you around, then. Give my regards to Origami.
Yes... Hm? Wife?
